thread.title: Kelly Brook posts racy naked bath pic from her New York hotel room
thread.title_full: Kelly Brook posts racy naked bath pic from her New York hotel room

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Kelly Brook posts racy naked bath pic from her New York hotel room
text:
Kelly Brook posts racy naked bath pic from her New York hotel room The star was enjoying a bubble bath while looking out on the city Share Kelly Brook posted the racy naked picture to Instagram (Photo: Instagram/Kelly Brook/Rex) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kelly Brook has shown off her incredible figure in a racy naked picture taken in the bath. 
The model-turned-presenter-turned-actress is enjoying a break in New York City with her boyfriend Jeremy Parisi, and uploaded the snap to Instgram. 
Kelly captioned the pic, “#BathwithaView”, showing her looking out the huge bathroom window of her room in The Ludlow hotel onto the city below. 
Kelly’s followers on Instagram were delighted by the shot, calling her “the most perfect woman in the world” and describing her as “angel of the earth”. Kelly posted the picture of her in the bath, presumably taken by her boyfriend Jeremy (Photo: Instagram/Kelly Brook) Kelly Brook brandishing a handbag on Lorraine (Photo: ITV) Kelly in the suggestive Baylis & Harding advert at the NTAs Kelly covers up when she's not in the bath (Photo: Splash News) Read More Kelly Brook sparks rumours she secretly got MARRIED as she flashes huge diamond ring 
One commenter even mistook her for another famously curvy star. “Thought this was Kim K for a minute,” they wrote. 
Kelly got the nation into a lather last month over her bath antics at the National Television Awards. 
The 37-year-old appeared in an advert for soap that ran just before the main show. And the raunchy advert was all anyone could talk about. 
She got ready for a big night out by running herself a bath in the steamy ad. 
Wearing a silky dressing gown she leaned over to pour in a generous glug of bubble bath – flaunting her famous cleavage. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
